Enum Player.Stance

    Player

    public static enum Player.Stance
extends java.lang.Enum<Player.Stance>
    The stance one player has towards another player.

      • getStanceFromTension

        public Player.Stance getStanceFromTension(Tension tension)
        Check whether tension has changed enough to merit a stance change. Do not simply check for crossing tension thresholds, add in Tension.DELTA to provide a bit of hysteresis to dampen ringing.
        Parameters:
        tension - The Tension to check.
        Returns:
        The Stance appropriate to the tension level.

      • getTensionModifier

        public int getTensionModifier(Player.Stance newStance)
                       throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        A stance change is about to happen. Get the appropriate tension modifier.
        Parameters:
        newStance - The new Stance.
        Returns:
        A modifier to the current tension.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException
